attributes.additional_details:
The current cost of motoring is horrendous.

the tax added to fuel is massive, and the prices the fuel companies charge is astronomical.

driving is becoming a leisure for the rich and we have to suffer the likes of BP producing massive billion pound profits and never reinvesting it.

There are currently little to no alternatives which are as accessible or even public transport is often flawed or expensive and sometimes not an option.

this is killing the country.
